page.title: 06 SUPERNATURAL HAPPENINGS
page.content: "In 1973 my family moved into Dean's Farm House, Gedney Drove End. It was originally owned by a man who rented it out to a farmer. This man decided that he wanted someone to purchase the house. The farmer refused to purchase it and so it was sold by auction to a couple who only lived in it for a few months, then we moved in. The house was in need of great repair for it had been untouched for years. When a damp course was put in, an old fireplace was uncovered which contained a leg of a stool and some clay pipes. When the fireplace was uncovered the ghost of an old lady was seen by us in front of the fireplace at regular intervals. But the old lady did not seem frightening, but very peaceful and quiet.
